content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To assist you with an electrical job, may I please have your full name?
Oh, hi, I'm Margaret. I’m not sure if this'll be easy for you, I don’t understand all this technical stuff.
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Sure thing, it’s 48 Maple Lane, Pleasantville. But I’m not sure if that's in your area.
Thanks for that, Margaret. Let me quickly check if we cover your address.
I'm sorry, Margaret, but it appears that your address is outside our service area. We won't be able to send a technician there.
Oh dear, that’s disappointing. Thanks for letting me know. I guess I’ll look elsewhere then.
